member.name: ID2D1CommandList.Close
member.summary: Instructs the command list to stop accepting commands so that you can use it as an input to an effect or in a call to . You should call the method after it has been attached to an and written to but before the command list is used.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Close has already been called on the command list.

returns.div: Note If the device context associated with the command list has an error, the command list returns the same error.

member.name: ID2D1CommandList.Stream
member.summary: Streams the contents of the command list to the specified command sink.
member.param: The sink into which the command list will be streamed.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.
The return value indicates any failures the command sink implementation returns through its method.
